column4: after installing windows 7 i recovered grub but its not showing windows..how do i fix it?
You still need the boot image for windows 7.  It behaves/boots different then xp
what exactly shud i do to dualboot windows 7 and ubuntu?
I remember seeing something special about win7 & later in regards to dual booting.  it was a complex setup because of the way win7 wriets to the mbr - try googling for it
